name: Rapid Reload
description:
The object of interest in this game is the mysterious Valkiry Stone. Two treasure hunters, Axel and Ruka, set out to find the stone, but the evil gang known as the Pumpkin Heads wants to find the stone first.

As either Axel or Ruka, blast your way through six side-scrolling levels against hordes of enemies, facing off against several bosses in each level. You can select from four different weapon effects (normal, bouncing, homing and flamethrower), use smartbombs and a grappling hook.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View

shot.caption: This is the title screen of the Japanese version of Rapid Reload – Gunner’s Heaven.
Yeah, yeah, it was a nice peaceful world we had once. We heard that story before.
The opening is not in FMV format, instead it is pixel art, which is consistent with the in-game graphics.
The player has a choice of two characters – a male, and a female.
A jungle stage in a side-scrolling run'n'gun? Now, where else have we seen that? Oh, right, right
A special code makes your sprite smaller, while retaining collision bounds, so you are the same easy target.
Aside from running, the game involves swinging, flying, and yes, even roller skating.
